name: Rising Calamity 6
description:
FullScreen Highly recommended!

You play as a monster constantly evolving, as you are being attacked the more damage you take the stronger you get to the point where you become an uncontrollable beast and wipe the entire city. Set the highest score possible before this happens.

Controls:

-left click to press the menu buttons.

-Aim with the mouse and shoot using the left click.

-Use either WASD or arrow keys to control the monster.

Enjoy
